plot: A devastating earthquake in Japan shakes the lives of two medical residents in Taipei as they deal with the loss of contact with close relatives and friends within a single weekend.
title: Shou ji li di yan lei
plot_es: A devastating earthquake in Japan shakes the lives of two medical residents in Taipei as they deal with the loss of contact with close relatives and friends within a single weekend.
original_name: Shou ji li di yan lei
plot_en: A devastating earthquake in Japan shakes the lives of two medical residents in Taipei as they deal with the loss of contact with close relatives and friends within a single weekend.
